```java
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: inventory-quarkus ![1](Images/1.png)
  labels:
    app: inventory-quarkus ![2](Images/2.png)
spec:
  containers: ![3](Images/3.png)
    - name: inventory-quarkus
      image: docker.io/modernizingjavaappsbook/inventory-quarkus:latest ![4](Images/4.png)
      ports:
        - containerPort: 8080 ![5](Images/5.png)
```

```java
NAME               READY  STATUS   RESTARTS  AGE
inventory-quarkus  1/1    Running  0         30s
```

```java
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: inventory-quarkus-service ![1](Images/1.png)
spec:
  selector:
    app: inventory-quarkus ![2](Images/2.png)
  ports:
    - protocol: TCP ![3](Images/3.png)
      port: 8080 ![4](Images/4.png)
      targetPort: 8080 ![5](Images/5.png)
```

```java
NAME                       TYPE       CLUSTER-IP    EXTERNAL-IP  PORT(S)   AGE
inventory-quarkus-service  ClusterIP  172.30.34.73  <none>       8080/TCP  6s
```

```java
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: inventory-quarkus-deploy ![1](Images/1.png)
  labels:
    app: inventory-quarkus ![2](Images/2.png)
spec:
  replicas: 1 ![3](Images/3.png)
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: inventory-quarkus ![4](Images/4.png)
  template: ![5](Images/5.png)
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: inventory-quarkus
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: inventory-quarkus
        image: docker.io/modernizingjavaappsbook/inventory-quarkus:latest ![6](Images/6.png)
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe: ![7](Images/7.png)
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          failureThreshold: 3
        livenessProbe: ![8](Images/8.png)
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          failureThreshold: 3
```
